item.description:
Let's come together to discuss our healing modalities to share stories, wisdom and inspiration. There are seven levels and various chakras that make up the human energy field. This field contains both the healthy and distorted patterns that we have acquired through life. A diseased condition may exist here prior to manifesting in our physical bodies. This is the dimension where the majority of healing is needed.

Share your story of healing or being healed. Non-practioners are welcome!

The following energy healing techniques are just some of the possible topics...

  • Aromatherapy
  • Breath Meditation
  • Chakra Balancing
  • Colour Healing
  • Sound Healing
  • Emotional Clearing 
  • Reiki
  • Opening to Guidance
  • Healing with Angels
  • Qi Qong
  • Astral Healing
  • Inner Child
  • Relationship Cords
  • Massage & Bodywork
  • Clearing Ancestral Patterns
  • Past Life Regression
  • Acupuncture
  • Entity Release
  • Hypnosis
  • Clearing Addictions
  • Tai Chi
  • Psychic Surgery
  • Healing with Ascended Masters
  • Life Purpose Alignment
  • Essence Expansion
  • Connecting Client to their Guides
  • Yoga
  • Food & Herbal Remedies
item.why: We need dicussion and idea-sharing to create a strong community.
item.name: Energy Healers Forum
